title: Contractionary fiscal policy shifts AD curve left

content.question: In the short run, a contractionary fiscal policy will

choices.label: shift the aggregate demand curve to the left
shift the short-run aggregate supply curve to the right
increase the demand for loanable funds

content.answer: shift the aggregate demand curve to the left
